item.title: About
item.description: It was March 2020. I was enjoying my growing career as a professional musician, choir conductor. Suddenly all my rehearsals were cancelled and all my concerts “rescheduled”. I told myself “Two or three month and I will be back to my music”. In the meanwhile, what to do with this excess of free time? I have always been comfortable around computers. I was four years old when my father bought the first one for his company.
